Name: Lounge zone
About the game: Want to have fun? Gather a group of friends and turn on the game. lounge zone is an experimental game. Roll the dice in turn and complete tasks. The 'lounge zone' can be played from two people to infinity. The game has 50 cells with different tasks. Each player in turn rolls the dice. After which he must complete the task that fell to him. Of the 50 tasks, 45 are not repeated. Throw a party with your friends.
